main.name: Vardhman dewasi
main.bio: Hello there! I’m Vardhman, a Mern developer, now advancing towards becoming a Software Developer. I specialize in creating scalable web applications and robust backend systems that deliver exceptional user experiences. With a strong foundation in frontend development using React, and extensive experience in backend technologies like Node.js and Express, I ensure seamless integration between client-side and server-side components. Driven by curiosity and a passion for technology, I constantly upgrade my skills to stay at the cutting edge. I thrive on challenges and excel in transforming complex requirements into high-quality solutions. Let’s connect and see how my expertise in both frontend and backend can add value to your next project.

work.title: Web Intern
work.description: Developed a travel website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing popular destinations and pricing for tourists.Implemented features for destination browsing and price comparison, enhancing user engagement.Applied responsive design techniques to ensure a seamless experience across all devices.Utilized version control tools like Git and GitHub for efficient code management and collaboration.

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
